content:
Huh, a group called Barcelona Free Software has their own Zulip at https://bcnfs.zulipchat.com

It sounds somewhat similar to us:

"Barcelona Free Software is a creators community of Free Software, also known as Open Source, in Barcelona. Our main activity is a Meetup group, an open gathering for developers and users who share a love for software freedom, but sometimes we organize bigger events too (like the Linux App Summit 2019)."

I think I'm fine staying on https://osdc.zulipchat.com
